accountFile - Variable in class bomberMan.Login.Model.UserDatabase
 
activateDetonator() - Method in class bomberMan.gamePlay.Model.Bomb
This method activates the detonator of a bomb that is going to be detonated by the bomberman.
addBomb(Bomb) - Method in class bomberMan.gamePlay.Model.BomberMan
This function adds a bomb object to the arraylist myBombs containing the bombs dropped by the bomberman.
addBomb(int, int, Bomb) - Method in class bomberMan.gamePlay.Model.GameBoard
This adds a bomb at the specified location
addPowerUp(PowerUp) - Method in class bomberMan.gamePlay.Model.GameBoard
This adds a power up to the game baord
addSavedGame(String, String) - Method in class bomberMan.Login.Model.User
This method adds the user's saved game name in the savedGames.txt database in the directory CSVfiles\ username It saves it under two separate columns "Game Name","Date/Time"
addTimeCreationInvisibilitPowerUp() - Method in class bomberMan.gamePlay.Model.BomberMan
This method updates the time creation of the invisibility power up of the bomberman.
